Detailed Description

Utility class that provides many commonly used methods and manages some utility classes.

Definition at line 174 of file Utils.cpp.

const double Utils::getDTime (  ) 

Get the time since the last frame was rendered.

Remarks:
This is a special number that is used to scale object movement so that all translations and rotations occur at the same rate no matter the FPS.

Definition at line 50 of file Utils.cpp.

const double Utils::getFPS (  ) 

Get the average number of frames render per second.

Remarks:
60 is the optimal number, but anything above 25 is acceptable.
